member.name: T:Leadtools.Multimedia.ConvertVideoOptions
member.summary: Options to use when converting an uploaded video resource.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.ConvertVideoOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the VideoViewer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.ConvertVideoOptions.preFetch
member.summary: Callback function that will fire before the toolkit fires a fetch request.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.ConvertVideoOptions.chunkSize
member.summary: The chunk size to use when uploading the document. Default value is 64 * 1024.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Multimedia.MultimediaFactory
member.summary: The MultimediaFactory is the main interface used for retrieving HTML5-safe multimedia resources.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.MultimediaFactory.convertVideo
member.summary: Converts an uploaded video resource to a web-compatible URL.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.MultimediaFactory.convertVideo
member.summary: Deletes any cached resources associated with a video source.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.MultimediaFactory.getPlayableUrl
member.summary: Retrieves a URL for a video source in a format that is web-compatible.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.MultimediaFactory.getPlayableUrlAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a URL for a video source in a format that is web-compatible.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer
member.summary: VideoViewer is the main class used by the Leadtools.Multimedia library for HTML5 multimedia viewing.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the VideoViewer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.clear
member.summary: Clears the current video element from the viewer.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.dispose
member.summary: Disposes of all resources that the `VideoViewer` instance is using.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.setVideo
member.summary: Creates a new video element based off the source uri.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.containerClass
member.summary: The CSS class that will be applied to the `viewerContainer` element.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.rootElement
member.summary: The element where the viewer is created into.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.video
member.summary: The current video element that is loaded into the viewer.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.videoClass
member.summary: The CSS class that will be applied to the `video` element.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Multimedia.VideoViewer.viewerElement
member.summary: The element associated with the viewer.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Multimedia.ServiceOptions
member.summary: Interface describing service related options.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Multimedia.ServiceOptions.preFetch
member.summary: Callback function that will fire before the toolkit fires a fetch request.
